add r2.xyz, v0.xyzx, -cb1[12].xyzx

ine r3.xyz, cb1[13].xyzx, l(1, 1, 1, 0)
if_nz r3.x

  and r4.xyzw, r4.xyzw, l(0x3f800000, 0x3f800000, 0x3f800000, 0x3f800000)

  iadd r3.xw, cb1[13].xxxx, l(-1, 0, 0, -2)
  ult r2.w, r0.w, r3.x
  if_nz r2.w

  add r3.x, -r1.w, r2.x

  mad r1.w, r1.w, l(2.000000), l(-1.000000)
  dp4 r2.w, cb1[0].xyzw, icb[r3.w + 0].xyzw
  add r2.w, r2.w, l(1.000000)
  mul r2.w, r2.w, l(0.500000)
  ge r2.w, r2.w, r2.x
  and r2.w, r2.w, l(0x3f800000)
  mul r1.w, r1.w, r2.w
  mul r2.w, cb1[0].x, l(0.500000)
  ge r2.x, r2.x, r2.w
  and r2.x, r2.x, l(0x3f800000)
  mul r4.x, r1.w, r2.x
else 
  mov r4.x, l(0)
  mov r0.w, l(0)
endif

  dp4 r1.w, r5.xyzw, l(1.000000, 1.000000, 1.000000, 1.000000)
  ftou r1.w, r1.w

  endif

  dp4 r2.w, cb1[1].xyzw, icb[r3.y + 0].xyzw
  add r2.w, r2.w, l(1.000000)
  mul r2.w, r2.w, l(0.500000)
  ge r2.w, r2.w, r2.y
  and r2.w, r2.w, l(0x3f800000)

  mul r4.y, r2.y, r2.x

  mov r1.w, l(0)
endif

if_nz r3.z
  ge r3.xyzw, r2.zzzz, cb1[2].xyzw
  and r3.xyzw, r3.xyzw, l(0x3f800000, 0x3f800000, 0x3f800000, 0x3f800000)

  iadd r2.yw, cb1[13].zzzz, l(0, -1, 0, -2)

    mov r2.y, l(1.000000)

  add r2.x, -r2.x, r2.y
  div r2.x, r3.x, r2.x

  dp4 r2.y, cb1[2].xyzw, icb[r2.w + 0].xyzw
  add r2.y, r2.y, l(1.000000)
  mul r2.y, r2.y, l(0.500000)
  ge r2.y, r2.y, r2.z
  and r2.y, r2.y, l(0x3f800000)
  mul r2.x, r2.y, r2.x
  mul r2.y, cb1[2].x, l(0.500000)
  ge r2.y, r2.z, r2.y
  and r2.y, r2.y, l(0x3f800000)
  mul r4.z, r2.y, r2.x
else 
  mov r4.z, l(0)
  mov r1.w, l(0)
endif

imad r0.w, r1.w, cb1[13].y, r0.w
lt r2.xyz, l(0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000), r4.xyzx
lt r3.xyz, r4.xyzx, l(0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
iadd r2.xyz, -r2.yxzy, r3.yxzy
imul null, r3.xy, r2.xzxx, cb1[13].xxxx
imad r2.w, r2.x, cb1[13].x, r2.y
mov r2.x, l(0)
mov r2.z, r3.x
iadd r2.xyzw, r0.wwww, r2.xyzw
imad r3.xyzw, r3.yyyy, cb1[13].yyyy, r2.xyzw
min r4.xyz, |r4.xyzx|, l(1.000000, 1.000000, 1.000000, 0.000000)
mul r4.xyz, r4.xyzx, l(0.500000, 0.500000, 0.500000, 0.000000)
ushr r5.xyzw, r2.xyzw, l(2, 2, 2, 2)
and r2.xyzw, r2.xyzw, l(3, 3, 3, 3)
dp4 r6.x, cb1[r5.x + 3].xyzw, icb[r2.x + 0].xyzw
dp4 r6.y, cb1[r5.y + 3].xyzw, icb[r2.y + 0].xyzw
dp4 r6.z, cb1[r5.z + 3].xyzw, icb[r2.z + 0].xyzw
dp4 r6.w, cb1[r5.w + 3].xyzw, icb[r2.w + 0].xyzw
ushr r2.xyzw, r3.xyzw, l(2, 2, 2, 2)
and r3.xyzw, r3.xyzw, l(3, 3, 3, 3)
dp4 r5.x, cb1[r2.x + 3].xyzw, icb[r3.x + 0].xyzw
dp4 r5.y, cb1[r2.y + 3].xyzw, icb[r3.y + 0].xyzw
dp4 r5.z, cb1[r2.z + 3].xyzw, icb[r3.z + 0].xyzw
dp4 r5.w, cb1[r2.w + 3].xyzw, icb[r3.w + 0].xyzw
add r2.xyzw, -r6.xyzw, r5.xyzw
mad r2.xyzw, r4.zzzz, r2.xyzw, r6.xyzw
add r2.zw, -r2.xxxy, r2.zzzw
mad r2.xy, r4.yyyy, r2.zwzz, r2.xyxx
add r0.w, -r2.x, r2.y
mad_sat r0.w, r4.x, r0.w, r2.x
mul r1.xyz, r0.wwww, r1.xyzx
mad r1.xyz, r1.xyzx, l(0.650000, 0.650000, 0.650000, 0.000000), v0.xyzx
mov r2.x, cb2[0].w
mov r2.y, cb2[1].w
mov r2.z, cb2[2].w
add r2.xyz, r2.xyzx, -cb0[174].xyzx
dp3 r0.w, r2.xyzx, r2.xyzx
sqrt r0.w, r0.w
add r0.w, r0.w, -cb3[7].x
add r2.x, cb3[6].y, -cb3[7].x
div_sat o0.w, r0.w, r2.x
mov r1.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r2.x, r1.xyzw, cb2[0].xyzw
dp4 r2.y, r1.xyzw, cb2[1].xyzw
dp4 r2.z, r1.xyzw, cb2[2].xyzw
add r1.xyz, r2.xyzx, -cb0[174].xyzx
mad r2.xyz, -r1.xyzx, l(0.001000, 0.001000, 0.001000, 0.000000), r2.xyzx
mul r1.xyz, r1.xyzx, l(0.999000, 0.999000, 0.999000, 0.000000)
mul r3.x, r1.x, cb0[58].x
mul r3.y, r1.x, cb0[59].x
mul r3.z, r1.x, cb0[60].x
mul r3.w, r1.x, cb0[61].x
mul r4.x, r1.y, cb0[58].y
mul r4.y, r1.y, cb0[59].y
mul r4.z, r1.y, cb0[60].y
mul r4.w, r1.y, cb0[61].y
mad r5.x, r1.z, cb0[58].z, cb0[58].w
mad r5.y, r1.z, cb0[59].z, cb0[59].w
mad r5.z, r1.z, cb0[60].z, cb0[60].w
mad r5.w, r1.z, cb0[61].z, cb0[61].w
add r1.xyzw, r4.xyzw, r5.xyzw
add r1.xyzw, r1.xyzw, r3.xyzw
dp3 o1.x, r0.xyzx, cb2[0].xyzx
dp3 o1.y, r0.xyzx, cb2[1].xyzx
dp3 o1.z, r0.xyzx, cb2[2].xyzx
add r0.xyz, r2.xyzx, -cb0[174].xyzx
dp3 r0.x, r0.xyzx, r0.xyzx
sqrt r0.x, r0.x
add r0.x, r0.x, -cb3[0].w
div_sat r0.x, r0.x, cb3[1].w
add o1.w, -r0.x, l(1.000000)
mov o0.xyz, r2.xyzx
mov o3.xyzw, r1.xyzw

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --auto-fix-vertex-halo -i --only-autofixed b1daf75d7bacaf03-vs.txt
ne r7.w, r1.w, l(1.0)
if_nz r7.w
  add r7.w, r1.w, -r7.y
  mad r1.x, r7.w, r7.x, r1.x
endif

mov o2.xy, r1.zwzz
ret 
// Approximately 191 instruction slots used
